name: ab2rexex2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w0))), universe)

stmt.origin: abrexex2(s0, s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w0))), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s2, c1, w0)), universe)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w0))), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s2, c1, w0)), universe)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s2, c1, w0)), universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(cab(s0, w0), universe)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s2, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w0))), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(cab(s0, w0), universe)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s2, c1)

comment: Existence of an existentially restricted class abstraction. ` ph ` normally has free-variable parameters ` x ` , ` y ` , and ` z ` . Compare ~ abrexex2 . (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-2011.)
